original_text: From the floor to above the door, cherubim and palm trees were carved; similarly the wall of the nave.
korean_text: 땅에서부터 문 통로 위에까지 그룹들과 종려나무들을 새겼으니 성전 벽이 다 그러하더라

sentences.original_text: From the floor to above the door,
cherubim and palm trees were carved
similarly the wall of the nave.
